import './login.css' import image from './../../../../assests/The Coupon Project Logo.png' import * as Yup from "yup"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import history from '../../history'; const validationSchema = Yup.object({ email: Yup.string().email('Invalid email format').required('Required'), password: Yup.string().required('Required') }) export default function Login() { const handleSubmit = (values, { setFieldValue }) => { //if login is successful if (true) { switch (values.type) { case 'Customer': history.push('/customer/home') break; case 'Company': history.push('/company/home') break; case 'Admin': history.push('/admin/home') break; default: history.push('/login') break; } return } //if login is unsuccessful setFieldValue('password', '') setTimeout(() => { alert("Email or Password are incorrect, try again.") }, 0) }; return (
handleSubmit(values, { setFieldValue })} validationSchema={validationSchema} > {({ isValid, dirty }) => (
)}
) }
